wikipedia_page.main: Cameron Roy Marchand Buchanan (born September 1946) is a Scottish Conservative Party politician who served as a Member of the Scottish Parliament (MSP) for the Lothian region from 2013 to 2016.

response: *[c] Upon the death of David McLetchie, he was replaced by Cameron Buchanan as the next name on the Lothian regional list for the Scottish Conservatives.
